data.title: Ideation
data.description: Generate and collect innovative ideas from team members and customers
data.details: Ideas can come from customer feedback, internal brainstorms, competitive analysis, or technical opportunities. Document the problem statement and proposed value.

data.title: Initial Review
data.description: Quick assessment of idea feasibility and alignment
data.details: Review team evaluates strategic fit, technical feasibility, and resource requirements. Ideas are either advanced, sent back for refinement, or archived.

data.title: Deep Dive Analysis
data.description: Detailed analysis of requirements, effort, and business case
data.details: Technical team creates architecture proposal, PM develops business case with ROI projections, and stakeholders are identified.

data.title: Approval Gateway
data.details: Leadership reviews business case, technical design, and resource requirements. Approved projects move to roadmap, others are deferred or cancelled.
data.outcomes: Approve and fund|Defer to future quarter|Cancel

data.title: Roadmap Planning
data.description: Schedule project into quarterly roadmap with milestones
data.details: PM and engineering leads define milestones, dependencies, and delivery timeline. Project is communicated to broader team.

data.title: Implementation
data.details: Agile development process with sprint planning, daily standups, code reviews, and testing. Regular demos to stakeholders ensure alignment.

data.title: Release & Launch
data.description: Deploy to production and communicate to customers
data.details: Feature is deployed, release notes are published, customer success is trained, and marketing materials are prepared.

data.title: Measurement & Feedback
data.description: Track adoption metrics and gather customer feedback
data.details: Monitor usage analytics, collect customer feedback, measure against success metrics defined in business case. Insights feed into future innovation cycle.
